an5.152:1.1: “Bhikkhus, someone with five qualities is unable to enter the sure path in regard to beneficial qualities even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.152:1.3: They discredit the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They’re witless, dull, and stupid. They think they understand what they don’t understand.
an5.152:1.4: Someone with these five qualities is unable to enter the sure path in regard to beneficial qualities even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.152:2.1: Someone with five qualities is able to enter the sure path in regard to beneficial qualities when listening to the true teaching.
an5.152:2.3: They don’t discredit the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They’re wise, not dull or stupid. They don’t think they understand what they don’t understand.
an5.152:2.4: Someone with these five qualities is able to enter the sure path in regard to beneficial qualities when listening to the true teaching.”
